LanguageData.FantasyBiotech_MessagePawnKilledRipscann: {PAWN_nameDef}'s body dissolved as their essence was transferred by the {BUILDING}
LanguageData.FantasyBiotech_MessageArtificerCasketOpe: {0} was a artificer. You can remove {0_possessive} {1_label} and use it on a colonist.
LanguageData.FantasyBiotech_LetterArtificerCasketOpen: You have found the corpse of an ancient artificer!\n\nExtract {PAWN_possessive} implant by selecting a colonist and right-clicking the corpse.
LanguageData.FantasyBiotech_LetterArtificerCasketFoun: You have discovered a artificer's sarcophagus!\n\nOpen it to find them inside.
